# Needle Hell

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Ninjutsu,
- Class: Offensive
- Range: Mid, Long
- Users: Jiraiya
- Media: Anime

## Summary
After using Needle Jiz≈ç to extend their hair around their body, the user shoots a barrage of hardened hair needles towards their opponent. The hairs themselves are strong enough to pierce through and destroy boulders.
